description: Humor on protons being catholic reflects playful science-religion wordplay.
title: Holy Protons!
n_1: Max and Leo, in a science lab, gaze at a particle display.
n_2: Leo looks skeptical, while Max browses a physics book.
c1_2: Not just mass, but they're catholic too!
n_3: Max smirks at Leo’s confusion, pointing at the book.
n_4: Both laugh at the joke, realizing the witty pun.
c1_4: Protons believe in the higher power of physics!
c2_4: Guess they’re more spiritual than us!
